attributes.action: To Open Professional Hairdressing Salons Earlier
attributes.additional_details: By not opening salons sooner this will have catastrophic results as members of the public will turn to home hairdressing or invite hairdressers into their homes/gardens, posing significant risk to livelihoods. As well as being one of the safest public services, the hairdressing industry contributes Billions towards to the UK economy each year.
attributes.background: Professional Hairdressing Salons are a public service that adhere to strict safety procedures. With additional PPE, including visors, masks, gloves, Screens & 2 metre distancing between each station, we are protected enough to carry out this service safely during this time.
